videos.description: The first points of the college football season come from Nebraska punt returner Cam Taylor-Britt hauling in a punt then getting tackled in the end zone for a safety.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Illinois scores first points of FBS season on head-scratching safety) 2021/08/28 ESHEET

videos.headline: Illinois scores first points of FBS season on head-scratching safety

videos.description: Nebraska running back Markese Stepp gets a huge gain with a wheel route. Then capitalizes on the drive with a short touchdown run.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF One-Play (Nebraska’s Stepp does it all on TD drive) 2021/08/28 ESHEET

videos.headline: Nebraska's Stepp does it all on TD drive

videos.description: The Fighting Illini extend their lead after tight end Luke Ford leaps and pulls in the short touchdown.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Luke Ford high-points ball for Illinois touchdown) 2021/08/28 ESHEET

videos.headline: Luke Ford high-points ball for Illinois touchdown

videos.description: Illinois' Artur Sitkowski drops a dime to Deuce Spann at the 1-yard line, setting up a short Isaiah Williams touchdown.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF One-Play (Deuce Spann’s incredible catch sets up short Illini TD) 2021/08/28 ESHEET

videos.headline: Deuce Spann's incredible catch sets up short Illini TD

videos.description: Adrian Martinez gets Nebraska back into the game as he escapes the pocket and takes off for the 75-yard touchdown run.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Martinez takes off for 75-yard TD run) 2021/08/28 ESHEET

videos.headline: Martinez takes off for 75-yard TD run

videos.description: Deontre Thomas and Garrett Nelson sacks Brandon Peters, who lands on his shoulder and is forced to leave the game.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Illinois QB Peters leaves game after taking sack) 2021/08/28 ESHEET

videos.headline: Illinois QB Peters leaves game after taking sack
